name: Accelerator-Incubator
shortDescription: A blended model positioning you for growth.
longDescription: ABB is the premier governance training ground and a hub for serious, growth-oriented founders. Our model is a hybrid, delivering end-to-end support from the initial idea stage to advanced scale.

programComparisons.targetAudience:
Early-Stage Founders
(Validated idea or business in its first 1-2 years)
programComparisons.keySupportProvided: Virtual Address, essential Core Masterclass training (governance, legal), and basic operational mentorship.

programComparisons.targetAudience:
Scaling CEOs
(Established businesses with proven traction and existing team)
programComparisons.serviceFocus: Rapid, strategic scaling and market expansion.
programComparisons.keySupportProvided: Advanced Strategy Workshops, personalized Executive Coaching, specialized Business Advisory, and high-level governance refinement.
